channel.title: mobile security on Security engineering by vixentael

item.title: Mobile app security roundtable with Anastasiia Voitova, Julia Potapenko and Julia Vashchenko
item.description: We had a lot of fun discussing the latest mobile app security topics from the eyes of people that build secure apps and help others to build secure apps: iOS14 privacy features, security.
